greek_pasta_salad.name: Greek Tortellini Pasta Salad
greek_pasta_salad.description: Refreshing and tasty pasta salad with lemon dressing.
instructions: Combine dressing ingredents in bowl to miz or jar to shake.
Ingredents for dressing are olive oil, apple cider vinegar, dried oregano, basil, thyme, sugar, dijon, and lemon juice.
Cook tortillini to prefered texture, aldente recommended.
Finely chop red onion and roughly chop artichoke.
Finely chop basil. Peel cucumber and slice, cut slices into quarters.
Combine all salad ingredents and add dressing.
For best taste refridgerate after adding dressing for 3-6 hours.

buffalo_chicken_dip.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
buffalo_chicken_dip.description: Staple party snack and great American side dish.
instructions: Lightly season chicken with salt and pepper.
Cook chicken on stovetop, shred when finished.
Combine all ingredents in saucepan and stir constantly.
Once cheese is melted (10-15 min), serve and enjoy!
